s1.message: The following lists the major changes compared to

s3.message: If you experience issues with this release please check the list of known issues.

s4.message: New typo correction feature helps avoid landing on malicious web pages (not enabled by default).

s5.message: License change: Source code license for Adblock Plus is now GNU General Public License version 3.0 instead of Mozilla Public License version 2.0

s6.message: Fixed: Firefox Sync support broken in Firefox 19.

s7.message: Fixed: Text in Filter Preferences window doesn't always adapt if the window is maximized (forum topic).

s8.message: Fixed: Progress bar in issue reporter should go from right to left for right-to-left languages.

s9.message: Removed use of E4X by the issue reporter (E4X is being deprecated by Mozilla).
